World Bank forecasts 2024 global growth to slow for third consecutive yearThe World Bank warned on Tuesday that global growth in 2024 is set to slow for a third year in a row, prolonging poverty and debilitating debt levels in many developing countries. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 14:35:32 GMT WONLBIHCPVP2RKLP622CWTSE7A https://www.reuters.com/markets/world-bank-forecasts-2024-global-growth-slow-for-third-consecutive-year-2024-01-09/David Lawder市场宏观问题
Grifols to hold board meeting Tuesday afternoon after Gotham City reportSpanish pharmaceutical company Grifols is set to hold a board meeting on Tuesday afternoon in reaction to a report from Gotham City Research questioning the company's accounting released earlier, board member Tomas Daga told Reuters. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 11:24:10 GMT ILYNHKGG3FMJVLXH7INJO255I https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/grifols-hold-board-meeting-tuesday-afternoon-after-gotham-city-report-2024-01-09/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
China likely dethroned Japan as world's top auto exporter in 2023: China groupChina is estimated to have overtaken Japan as the world's largest auto exporter in 2023, the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) said on Tuesday, as BYD , Chery and other domestic automakers made major strides overseas. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 11:11:15 GMT XVFNLPWKIVIMBE4TNRHQBQKXUI https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/china-likely-dethroned-japan-worlds-top-auto-exporter-2023-china-group-2024-01-09/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Morning Bid: Wall St re-finds mojo - but hurdles aheadA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Tue, 09 Jan 2024 11:07:56 GMT 4LWBES4CWFLLNOHFTG57PRRNWY https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-01-09/Reuters市场美国市场
Britain's Oxford Nanopore's shares sink after revenue warningShares in Britain's Oxford Nanopore dropped nearly 12% on Tuesday, after the sensing technology company issued a revenue warning, citing a slowdown in China and the Middle East, along with staggered purchases from large clients. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 11:01:10 GMT IDHWDIJBYZPRFB6C2PVVHGF7W4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/britain-oxford-nanopores-shares-sink-after-revenue-warning-2024-01-09/Reuters技术
Chinese auto brands to improve profitability with EV upgrades -UBSChinese auto brands are set for better profitability in 2024 despite intensifying competition in the world's largest auto market, UBS analysts said on Tuesday, thanks to upgrades they have been making in their electric vehicle (EV) product mix. Tue, 09 Jan 2024 09:57:02 GMT JCU5IYJWQNO7FAYIAPYN2BNALI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-auto-brands-improve-profitability-with-ev-upgrades-ubs-2024-01-09/Reuters商业带电
